Quotes: You cannot simultaneously prevent and prepare for war.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: There is no logical way to the discovery of these elemental laws. There is only the way of intuition, which is helped by a feeling for the order lying behind the appearance.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: The absent are never without fault, nor the present without excuse.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quotes: Look at situations from all angles, and you will become more open.
Author: Dalai Lama

Quotes: We always get bored with those whom we bore.
Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

Quotes: Which government is the best? The one that teaches us to govern ourselves.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes: There is something pagan in me that I cannot shake off. In short, I deny nothing, but doubt everything.
Author: Lord Byron

Quotes: I make it a rule never to smoke while I'm sleeping.
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
Author: Mark Twain
